ActionCadenceRuleCondition.name: ActionCadenceRuleCondition
ActionCadenceRuleCondition.description: Represents the logic for a branch step.

ActionCadenceRuleId.description: The ID of the ActionCadenceRule that this condition is associated with.

Operator.description: The conditional operator for this rule. Possible values are: Equal

Resource.description: The field to evaluate. Possible values are: CallDispositionCategoryUse by branch steps. EmailEngagementUsed by ListenerBranch steps.

RuleConditionName.description: The name of the rule condition. Every rule condition in a cadence must have a unique name.

Value.description: The event that your cadence rule condition listens for to decide when the event is complete. Possible values for emails are: EmailOpen EmailLinkClick Possible values for calls are: CallMeaningfulConnect CallUnqualified CallLeftVoicemail CallNotInterested CallCallBackLater
